sentence.Network_en: He was born in 1768 in the house abutting our hotel.
sentence.Network_cn: 他于1768年出生于我们旅馆旁边的一幢房子里。

sentence.Network_en: An earthquake hit the area abutting our province.
sentence.Network_cn: 与我省邻接的地区遭受了一次地震.

sentence.Network_en: The waist back abutting massage wheel, both hands grasp the arm rest.
sentence.Network_cn: 腰背部紧靠按摩轮, 双手握扶手.

entry.def: When land or a building abuts something or abuts on something, it is next to it.

example.ex: One edge of the garden abutted on an old entrance to the mine...
example.tran: 花园的一侧紧靠着矿井的旧入口。

example.ex: He was born in 1768 in the house abutting our hotel.
example.tran: 他于1768年出生于我们旅馆旁边的一幢房子里。

means.word_mean: 1. having a common boundary or edge; touching;

sentences.sentence: "Rhode Island has two bordering states; Massachusetts and Conncecticut"
"the side of Germany conterminous with France"
"Utah and the contiguous state of Idaho"
